meanings.definition: A person who engages in sexual activity with another person.
meanings.sent1: The lovemakers shared a special connection.
meanings.sent2: The lovemakers were deeply in love.
meanings.sent3: The lovemakers giggled as they enjoyed their time together.
meanings.sent4: The lovemakers danced in the moonlight, their passion evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The lovemakers embraced, lost in each other's arms.

meanings.definition: A device or object used to enhance sexual pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a variety of lovemakers for sale.
meanings.sent2: She discreetly packed her favorite lovemakers for the weekend getaway.
meanings.sent3: The lovemakers in the drawer always brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The new lovemakers promised an unforgettable experience.
meanings.sent5: He carefully selected the perfect lovemakers for their anniversary.

meanings.definition: A term used to describe individuals who are skilled at creating romantic relationships.
meanings.sent1: The lovemakers effortlessly brought people together.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the best lovemakers in town.
meanings.sent3: The lovemakers had a knack for matchmaking their friends.
meanings.sent4: His words were like magic, a true lovemaker in action.
meanings.sent5: The lovemakers' advice on love was always sought after.
